com.jaxio.celerio.model.support.validation

Class ValidationAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaxio.celerio.spi.support.AbstractAttributeSpi
      • com.jaxio.celerio.model.support.validation.ValidationAttribute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PackageImportAdder, AttributeSpi

    public class ValidationAttribute
extends AbstractAttributeSpi
    Default SPI for the "validation" velocity var. Developer may override it.
    Provides convenient helper to generate validation annotation that apply to an attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • velocityVar

        public String velocityVar()
        Description copied from interface: AttributeSpi
        The var name under which this AttributeSpi is available during template evaluation.
        For example if velocityVar() methods returns myextension, the corresponding AttributeSpi implementation instance is given by $attribute.myextension.

      • getAnnotations

        public List<String> getAnnotations()
        Returns all the validation annotations for the attribute. Imports are processed automatically.
